mapper.sql: select l.info_id,l.user_name,l.ipaddr, l.status,l.msg,l.access_time from sys_logininfor l
mapper.insert: insert into sys_logininfor (info_id,user_name, status, ipaddr, msg, access_time,user_id,consume_time) values (#{infoId},#{userName}, #{status}, #{ipaddr}, #{msg}, now(), #{userId}, #{consumeTime})
mapper.select:
select info_id, user_id, user_name, ipaddr, status, msg, access_time, consume_time from sys_logininfor
AND ipaddr like concat('%', replace(#{ipaddr}::text, '_', '\_'), '%')
AND status = #{status}
AND user_name like concat('%', replace(#{userName}::text, '_', '\_'), '%')
AND to_date(cast(access_time as TEXT),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') >= to_date(cast(#{params.beginTime} as TEXT),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND to_date(cast(access_time as TEXT),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') <= to_date(cast(#{params.endTime} as TEXT),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
order by info_id desc
mapper.delete:
delete from sys_logininfor where info_id in
#{infoId}
